name: Int.dist_eq
initialProofState:
x y : Int
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist x y) (abs (HSub.hSub ↑x ↑y))
decl: theorem dist_eq (x y : ℤ) : dist x y = |(x : ℝ) - y| := rfl

name: Int.dist_eq'
initialProofState:
m n : Int
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist m n) ↑(abs (HSub.hSub m n))
decl: theorem dist_eq' (m n : ℤ) : dist m n = |m - n| := by rw [dist_eq]; norm_cast

name: Int.dist_cast_real
initialProofState:
x y : Int
⊢ Eq (Dist.dist ↑x ↑y) (Dist.dist x y)
decl:
@[norm_cast, simp]
theorem dist_cast_real (x y : ℤ) : dist (x : ℝ) y = dist x y :=
  rfl

name: Int.pairwise_one_le_dist
initialProofState: ⊢ Pairwise fun m n => LE.le 1 (Dist.dist m n)
decl:
theorem pairwise_one_le_dist : Pairwise fun m n : ℤ => 1 ≤ dist m n := by
  intro m n hne
  rw [dist_eq]; norm_cast; rwa [← zero_add (1 : ℤ), Int.add_one_le_iff, abs_pos, sub_ne_zero]

name: Int.isUniformEmbedding_coe_real
decl:
theorem isUniformEmbedding_coe_real : IsUniformEmbedding ((↑) : ℤ → ℝ) :=
  isUniformEmbedding_bot_of_pairwise_le_dist zero_lt_one pairwise_one_le_dist

name: Int.isClosedEmbedding_coe_real
decl:
theorem isClosedEmbedding_coe_real : IsClosedEmbedding ((↑) : ℤ → ℝ) :=
  isClosedEmbedding_of_pairwise_le_dist zero_lt_one pairwise_one_le_dist

name: Int.preimage_ball
initialProofState:
x : Int
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage Int.cast (Metric.ball (↑x) r)) (Metric.ball x r)
decl: theorem preimage_ball (x : ℤ) (r : ℝ) : (↑) ⁻¹' ball (x : ℝ) r = ball x r := rfl

name: Int.preimage_closedBall
initialProofState:
x : Int
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Set.preimage Int.cast (Metric.closedBall (↑x) r)) (Metric.closedBall x r)
decl: theorem preimage_closedBall (x : ℤ) (r : ℝ) : (↑) ⁻¹' closedBall (x : ℝ) r = closedBall x r := rfl

name: Int.ball_eq_Ioo
initialProofState:
x : Int
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Metric.ball x r) (Set.Ioo (Int.floor (HSub.hSub (↑x) r)) (Int.ceil (HAdd.hAdd (↑x) r)))
decl:
theorem ball_eq_Ioo (x : ℤ) (r : ℝ) : ball x r = Ioo ⌊↑x - r⌋ ⌈↑x + r⌉ := by
  rw [← preimage_ball, Real.ball_eq_Ioo, preimage_Ioo]

name: Int.closedBall_eq_Icc
initialProofState:
x : Int
r : Real
⊢ Eq (Metric.closedBall x r) (Set.Icc (Int.ceil (HSub.hSub (↑x) r)) (Int.floor (HAdd.hAdd (↑x) r)))
decl:
theorem closedBall_eq_Icc (x : ℤ) (r : ℝ) : closedBall x r = Icc ⌈↑x - r⌉ ⌊↑x + r⌋ := by
  rw [← preimage_closedBall, Real.closedBall_eq_Icc, preimage_Icc]

name: Int.instProperSpace
decl:
instance : ProperSpace ℤ :=
  ⟨fun x r => by
    rw [closedBall_eq_Icc]
    exact (Set.finite_Icc _ _).isCompact⟩

name: Int.cobounded_eq
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cobounded_eq : Bornology.cobounded ℤ = atBot ⊔ atTop := by
  simp_rw [← comap_dist_right_atTop (0 : ℤ), dist_eq', sub_zero,
    ← comap_abs_atTop, ← @Int.comap_cast_atTop ℝ, comap_comap]; rfl

name: Int.cofinite_eq
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cofinite_eq : (cofinite : Filter ℤ) = atBot ⊔ atTop := by
  rw [← cocompact_eq_cofinite, cocompact_eq_atBot_atTop]
